name: The Three Guardians
description: This is a project that I'm making by myself with RPG Maker VX Ace. It's an rpg that let's go some of the game mechanics of other rpgs, here you can't change equipment aside a gem, it doesn't have a world map, you only control 3 main characters, each unique. This game contains scripts from Galv, Yanflly, Pacman and KilloZapit. The title screen music is Bard Song (Karaoke), and one in-game is Phantasy Star Universe Hogosha OC ReMix.
